    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zabava z Butalci</string>
            <string language="en">Having fun with Butalci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spaß mit Butalci haben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avoir l'amusement avec Butalci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tendo o divertimento com Butalci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Avere divertimento con Butalci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατοχή της διασκέδασης με Butalci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tener diversión con Butalci</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Primer uporabe besedila iz Butalcev za organiziranje lutkovne predstave.</string>
            <string language="en">Using one of the story from novel \"Butalci\" in order to organize puppet show.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lutkovna predstava</string>
            <string language="en">puppet show</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">butalci</string>
            <string language="en">butalci</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lutka</string>
            <string language="en">puppet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit einem der Geschichte vom Roman \"Butalci \", 
um Marionette zu organisieren stellen Sie dar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant un de l'histoire du \"Butalci de 
roman \" afin d'organiser la marionnette montrez.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando uma da história do \"Butalci da novela \" 
a fim organizar o fantoche mostre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando uno della storia dal \"Butalci del romanzo 
\" per organizzare il puppet mostri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας μιας από την ιστορία από νέο 
\"Butalci \" προκειμένου να οργανωθεί η μαριονέτα εμφανίστε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con uno de la historia del \"Butalci de la novela 
\" para ordenar la marioneta muestre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Marionette Erscheinen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">butalci</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Marionette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exposition de marionnette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">butalci</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">marionnette</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fantoche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">butalci</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">puppet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μαριονέτα εμφανίζει</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
